title: 5xx errors number is high
description: The Apache Traffic Server can have issues that prevent it from fulfilling a client's request. This monitor tracks anomalies in the 5xx HTTP response codes from the Apache Traffic Server to provide insights into unusual server errors.

definition.message: Number of 5xx errors on Traffic Server is at {{value}} which is higher than usual.
definition.name: [Traffic Server] 5xx Errors higher than usual
